title: Minimalists and Maximalists Agree—Polka Dots Are the Print of the Moment
description: Minimalists and Maximalists Agree—Polka Dots Are the Print of the Moment
excerpt: The polka dot print is everywhere and it's the perfect trend for summer. Shop 32 pieces worth adding to your wardrobe.
text: Chances are, if you open up Instagram right now, you’ll spot someone in polka dots. The French-girl fave has been stealing hearts all spring and there’s no sign of it slowing down. Whether your wardrobe leans sleek and simple or unapologetically bold, there’s one thing both camps can agree on right now: polka dots are having a major moment. The timeless print is back in full force, showing up on everything from flowy dresses to tailored separates. Read ahead to embrace this anti-trend, no matter your style.MINIMALIST(Image credit: Launchmetrics; Design by Jamie Brown)If your wardrobe is defined by clean, neutral, and thoughtfully simple pieces, polka dots may seem like a bold detour, but the right version can feel entirely at home in any minimalist’s closet. Micro dots in monochrome colorways, or subtly spaced buttons on a structured and chic silhouette add just enough visual interest to an outfit without overpowering it. Minimalists through the ages have leaned on this tried and true pattern, and it is proof that you don’t need to shout to be heard. Reformation Kaylia Tie Neck Minidress Pair this with kitten heels and a mini handbag and prepare to wear it on repeat. The bow is the cherry on top. Magda Butrym Short Sleeve Mini Dress I have your next big event dress sorted. Elegant doesn’t begin to cut it. Runaway the Label Karlita Bustier Another gorgeous set option. And the price point? Yes, please. Shop the matching skirt, 94 Calzedonia Sheer Polka Dot Tights Throw these on for the perfect french girl touch. Posse Paloma Polka-Dot Cotton Maxi Dress Ciao Lucia Nadine Polka Dot Dress Ciao Lucia just gets polka dots. Idah Studio Amira Bustier and Allura Maxi Set, Polka Dot Cotton The soft tailoring makes for the most ethereal look. Miu Miu Polka-Dot Chiffon Skirt Sheer, airy, and unmistakably Miu Miu. You'll find every fashion girl wearing this around the streets of New York come next month. Doen Maryanna Bow-Detailed Ruched Polka-Dot Silk-Georgette Midi Dress Dôen can do no wrong in my eyes. Rixo Julien, Emma Spot Deep Navy An easy one-piece outfit upgrade. Zara Satin Effect Polka Dot Sandals Mango Polka-Dot Wrap-Neck Blouse Another chic scarf moment. I will be wearing this all summer long with skirts, shorts, capris—you name it. Campbell & Kramer Olympia Top in Black Polka Dot Sustainable, chic, and made in LA. Enough said.Shop the matching skirt, 100 Shopbop Self Portrait Navy Polka Dot Satin Midi Dress The heavyweight satin fabric gives this the most luxe feel. Frankies Bikinis Reign Polka Dot Maxi Dress, White Polka Dot Nice and breezy for even the hottest summer days. MAXIMALIST(Image credit: Launchmetrics; Design by Jamie Brown)Maximalists, rejoice! Polka dots are the kind of personality-packed print that is practically made for your wardrobe. They seamlessly slot into a wardrobe brimming with unique textures, varying prints, and bold colors. Oversized dots in vibrant hues, or even in the traditional black and white on unsuspecting silhouettes add undeniable interest to any outfit. For the style adventurous, polka dots are less of a print, and more of a power move. They nod to retro-glamor, but feel entirely modern. Style them with other fun prints for the ultimate statement look. Ganni White & Black Polka-Dot Satin Corset Minidress All I'm saying is that bloomers are back. Get on board. Tailored enough for meetings, but fun enough for margs. Ganni Polka-Dot Mini Ganni Bou Bag As a polka-dot fanatic, this one has been on my wishlist for a while now. It's such an easy accessory to spruce up a neutral look, or wear it with even more prints to lean into the maximalist vibe. The mesh fabric brings such an unexpectedly cool edge to this dress. Self-Portrait Pleated Polka-Dot Duchesse-Satin Mini Dress Retro-inspired in the best way. You’ll get your money’s worth on this one. Promise. Patou Pussy-Bow Polka-Dot Silk-Twill Blouse I'm a sucker for an oversized bow. For Love & Lemons Dolly Dot Denim Button-Down Top The kind of top that makes you book a beach vacation. I'm picturing it over a white bikini paired with sandals, but it does come with matching shorts.Shop the matching skort, 169 Khaite Elena Studded Textured-Leather Shoulder Bag THE holy grail polka-dot coded bag for any fashion girl. Free People Bop Around Printed Romper Looks like a dress, wears like a romper. Zara Polka Dot Print Scarf Are you sensing a trend here? Caroline Constas Emilia Maxi Dress Pack your passport. This puff-sleeve moment needs a background of cobblestones and spritzes. This retro beauty is a timeless classic.
html:
Chances are, if you open up Instagram right now, you’ll spot someone in polka dots. The French-girl fave has been stealing hearts all spring and there’s no sign of it slowing down. Whether your wardrobe leans sleek and simple or unapologetically bold, there’s one thing both camps can agree on right now: polka dots are having a major moment. The timeless print is back in full force, showing up on everything from flowy dresses to tailored separates. Read ahead to embrace this anti-trend, no matter your style.

MINIMALIST

If your wardrobe is defined by clean, neutral, and thoughtfully simple pieces, polka dots may seem like a bold detour, but the right version can feel entirely at home in any minimalist’s closet. Micro dots in monochrome colorways, or subtly spaced buttons on a structured and chic silhouette add just enough visual interest to an outfit without overpowering it. Minimalists through the ages have leaned on this tried and true pattern, and it is proof that you don’t need to shout to be heard.

Reformation

Kaylia Tie Neck Minidress

Pair this with kitten heels and a mini handbag and prepare to wear it on repeat. The bow is the cherry on top.

Magda Butrym

Short Sleeve Mini Dress

I have your next big event dress sorted. Elegant doesn’t begin to cut it.

Runaway the Label

Karlita Bustier

Another gorgeous set option. And the price point? Yes, please.

Shop the matching skirt, 94

Calzedonia

Sheer Polka Dot Tights

Throw these on for the perfect french girl touch.

Posse

Paloma Polka-Dot Cotton Maxi Dress

Ciao Lucia

Nadine Polka Dot Dress

Ciao Lucia just gets polka dots.

Idah Studio

Amira Bustier and Allura Maxi Set, Polka Dot Cotton

The soft tailoring makes for the most ethereal look.

Miu Miu

Polka-Dot Chiffon Skirt

Sheer, airy, and unmistakably Miu Miu. You'll find every fashion girl wearing this around the streets of New York come next month.

Doen

Maryanna Bow-Detailed Ruched Polka-Dot Silk-Georgette Midi Dress

Dôen can do no wrong in my eyes.

Rixo

Julien, Emma Spot Deep Navy

An easy one-piece outfit upgrade.

Zara

Satin Effect Polka Dot Sandals

Mango

Polka-Dot Wrap-Neck Blouse

Another chic scarf moment.

I will be wearing this all summer long with skirts, shorts, capris—you name it.

Campbell & Kramer

Olympia Top in Black Polka Dot

Sustainable, chic, and made in LA. Enough said.

Shop the matching skirt, 100

Shopbop

Self Portrait Navy Polka Dot Satin Midi Dress

The heavyweight satin fabric gives this the most luxe feel.

Frankies Bikinis

Reign Polka Dot Maxi Dress, White Polka Dot

Nice and breezy for even the hottest summer days.

MAXIMALIST

Maximalists, rejoice! Polka dots are the kind of personality-packed print that is practically made for your wardrobe. They seamlessly slot into a wardrobe brimming with unique textures, varying prints, and bold colors. Oversized dots in vibrant hues, or even in the traditional black and white on unsuspecting silhouettes add undeniable interest to any outfit. For the style adventurous, polka dots are less of a print, and more of a power move. They nod to retro-glamor, but feel entirely modern. Style them with other fun prints for the ultimate statement look.

Ganni

White & Black Polka-Dot Satin Corset Minidress

All I'm saying is that bloomers are back. Get on board.

Tailored enough for meetings, but fun enough for margs.

Ganni

Polka-Dot Mini Ganni Bou Bag

As a polka-dot fanatic, this one has been on my wishlist for a while now. It's such an easy accessory to spruce up a neutral look, or wear it with even more prints to lean into the maximalist vibe.

The mesh fabric brings such an unexpectedly cool edge to this dress.

Self-Portrait

Pleated Polka-Dot Duchesse-Satin Mini Dress

Retro-inspired in the best way.

You’ll get your money’s worth on this one. Promise.

Patou

Pussy-Bow Polka-Dot Silk-Twill Blouse

I'm a sucker for an oversized bow.

For Love & Lemons

Dolly Dot Denim Button-Down Top

The kind of top that makes you book a beach vacation. I'm picturing it over a white bikini paired with sandals, but it does come with matching shorts.

Shop the matching skort, 169

Khaite

Elena Studded Textured-Leather Shoulder Bag

THE holy grail polka-dot coded bag for any fashion girl.

Free People

Bop Around Printed Romper

Looks like a dress, wears like a romper.

Zara

Polka Dot Print Scarf

Are you sensing a trend here?

Caroline Constas

Emilia Maxi Dress

Pack your passport. This puff-sleeve moment needs a background of cobblestones and spritzes.

This retro beauty is a timeless classic.
